sql.if: where brname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or memid like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or brstatus like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.select: select branchnum,pronum,brname from branch where pronum in (select PRONUM from proposal where cityaddr=#{cityaddr})
select b.brName from proposal p,branch b where b.proNum=p.proNum and p.proAddr=#{proAddr}
select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select p.cityAddr,b.brName,b.Regdate from proposal p,branch b where p.proNum=b.proNum order by b.Regdate desc ) ) where rnum<=3
select BRANCHNUM,PRONUM,BRNAME,MEMID,BRSTATUS from branch ms where ms.brstatus='영업중' and ms.memid = (select memid from membership where memid=#{memId} and mempwd=#{memPwd})
